attributes.action: To close our boarders and stop imagration for a period of time to enable the deportation of illegal immagrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At this time we seem to have a problem with illegal imagrates entering the country and disapearing plus criminal elements entering the country unchallenged so affecting our security and illegaly claiming benefits so 
de-stablising our state benefits for UK residents and genuine imigrants.With the goverment bodies unable to cope surley it would be commen sence to close the borders till such time as we can say the above problems are contained and all agencies have there policies reviewed and made water tight.Does it make sense to keep bailing out a boat till it sinks or would you put it into dry dock till properly fixed ?
